channel.title: Death of rsc
channel.description:
I was talking to Tim aka sw0o0sh last night about old times of rsc and it hit me how shit any rsc p server is. Not because of bad admins or bad updates but because you will never be able replace rsc. I miss days when there were loads full worlds and switching worlds to pk different people not just to find people. I remember rsc back when there was no wilderness and then it got added and I was like WTF is this. I guess I have just grown out of it. They were good times it will never be same. Thought I would just post my thought of rsc since I have been around it from beginning. I played gamesdomain before rsc which was owned by jagex lol.
Rip rsc

item.title: Death of rsc
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“5 1, post:10, topic:360750”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=457048.msg3345386#msg3345386 date=1284804687]

wasn’t this the same thread i made few days ago

Yeah it is. And you said “im not gonna log in rsc or a private server ever again…” And you logged in yesterday rofl.

good one, yeah i was showing some real life friends about classic while botting rs2.
[/quote]
Good one? It’s the truth rofl. You’re the one that said it and already went back on your word. You’ve quit the community like 10x. Just quit already, no one wants you here anymore.[/quote]

I will never play RSC again and it's time to face that.

i meant play it properly (put hours of work into leveling skills). That does not mean i can’t log onto the server i’m an admin of now and then…

Quit the community 10 times? not once have i quit the community idiot, get facts straight please.

Read full topic

item.title: Death of rsc
item.dc:creator: @forgez forgez
item.description:
@forgez wrote:

Things die with people who create and support them. When you still have only one-two people - idea, interest, game didnt die. So it die in minds not in actually itself.
